## querySubtasks() function

Query subtasks of a parent task in OmniFocus with pagination.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function querySubtasks(
  parentTaskId: string,
  options?: SubtaskQueryOptions
): Promise<CliOutput<PaginatedResult<OFTaskWithChildren>>>;
```
